whoami.name: Matthew C. Brown
whoami.summary: Mobile and web applications developer with more than a decade of experience specializing in cross-platform and native mobile app development and user experience design

employment.title: Software Developer
employment.summary: Lead developer for numerous mission-critical Android applications. Leveraging React Native and ClojureScript, I built tools and applications that facilitated secure communications and application distribution and deployment.
lines: Utilized React Native on Android to leverage our existing JavaScript and ClojureScript infrastructure, allowing for incredibly concise and declarative code, contributing to rapid application development and deployment

Developed reactive UIs for applications and services requiring real-time data processing and visualization; designed user experiences involving browsing application catalogues, sending messages and uploading multimedia, and displaying charts and statistics

Employed offline-first strategies to create satisfying user experiences in low-connectivity environments; wrote sophisticated synchronization logic that facilitated efficient downloading of application data through websockets when connectivity was available

Leveraged the Android Device Policy Manager API to develop a bespoke MDM solution that enabled the secure remote management of devices, while also facilitating the distribution of applications to end-users

Developed several custom React Native library projects for use within our mobile applications, including a library for establishing secure mTLS connections, as well as performant QR code reader for scanning and extracting payloads

Utilized Electron and .NET-based frameworks to develop Windows applications with a ClojureScript frontend and a C# backend; leveraged existing React and TailwindCSS infrastructure to create an effective UI that wrapped functionality provided by third-party Windows DLLs

employment.title: Independent Contractor
employment.summary: Provided clients, both locally and internationally, with start-to-finish development and deployment for applications of all kinds across diverse platforms, including iOS, Android, Roku, and web.
lines: Led the development of an iOS/iPadOS TV-anywhere application, utilizing DRM-related SDKs and frameworks for protecting and delivering encrypted digital content on Apple devices; implemented intuitive interfaces and controls resulting in a rich viewing experience for end-users

Led the development on the React Native mobile application of a grocery savings platform; leveraged machine learning for object detection to implement a sophisticated computer vision pipeline that performed on-device inferences of live camera images, identifying and extracting meaningful product-specific data to deliver relevant price and product information to end-users

Led the development of an iOS photo-sharing and rating application with bespoke animations and UI for generating meaningful feedback; implemented and managed a Firebase application instance to serve as our backend infrastructure

Led the development of an iOS augmented reality application that allowed users to customize footwear and visualize it in their environment; utilized SceneKit and ARKit to create a native and responsive user experience

employment.title: Senior Software Engineer
employment.summary: Worked with and guided a team of developers to mobilize many existing Synacor services and bring a consistent generation of TV-anywhere and email products to iOS and Android.
lines: Worked with designers to create elegant and functional iOS and Android user experiences with a pixel-level attention to detail
Utilized SDKs specializing in protecting and delivering encrypted digital video content and crafted scenes and interfaces that resulted in rich and immersive viewing experiences for end users
Developed reusable view component libraries and patterns to simplify and expedite the implementation of common UX use-cases

Led the development of the Cloud ID™ SDK for iOS, simplifying the login process for subscribers of our partners' products and services, drastically decreasing the amount of time required to deploy to market and onboard users into our applications

employment.title: Software Developer
employment.summary: Later acquired by Synacor for our team's mobile device capabilities and technology, at Teknision, I developed a deep familiarity with Android building custom launchers for wireless communications providers.
lines: Worked with designers to implement a cohesive experience across all aspects of a bespoke Android Launcher, including unique animations and gestures for interacting with the UI, as well as custom overscroll functionality
Wrote performant code responsible for managing the state of the UI in numerous scenarios, including application catalogue management, widget customization, application launching, and task-switching
Utilized the AOSP to assist in the development of a customized Android ROM that incorporated our launcher, customizing OS source as necessary based on the needs of our client
Led the refactor and redesign of several internal tools and core libraries that were integral to our common infrastructure and top-level application projects

employment.title: IT Security General Support Specialist
employment.summary: Developed and maintained an automated testing suite to test the reliability and functionality of our Government of Canada Branded Credential Service project, a single sign-on user authentication service.

projects.title: Curriculum Vitae
projects.summary: This résumé is actually React web app written using TypeScript and TailwindCSS.
lines: Designed to be easily exported in the webpage as a PDF, suitable for printing if necessary
Built with quick customizability in mind, allowing for dark or light variants, condensed single-page or detailed multi-page viewing

projects.title: CollectionView.swift
projects.summary: An elegant SwiftUI wrapper around UIKit's UICollectionView API
lines: Bridges UICollectionView into SwiftUI, providing an easier way to render dynamic collections of content as SwiftUI continues to mature
Flexible and declarative API allows for a high degree of customizability in just a few lines, while providing direct access to UIKit API if necessary

projects.title: Cursieve
projects.summary: A Rust crate for serializing and deserializing binary data to and from annotated structures.
lines: Developed to make packing and unpacking binary data files easier; Rust structs define the shape of the data, and reserializing the structure into existing binary data leaves undefined regions of bytes untouched
Leverages Rust's powerful annotation and macro system, allowing for an incredibly concise and declarative syntax for specifying which fields map to which regions of data
Developed primarily for use in my save-editor application projects, for modifying the contents of save files of particular video games

projects.title: SA2 Gardening Tools
projects.summary: A cross-platform desktop application for editing save files from the Sonic Adventure 2 video game
lines: Built using Tauri with a Rust backend and a TypeScript + React + TailwindCSS frontend
Developed in tandem with Cursieve, to make defining the Rust types that represent the structure of the save file easy

Additionally uses Serde to allow for easy transformation of Rust types to and from JSON structures, of which the frontend can easily articulate to provide a UI that displays and can modify the data, which can then be reserialized into bytes using Cursieve
